frontend.instructions:
1. Build: cd mr-robot && npm run build
2. Upload mr-robot/dist/ contents to public_html/
3. Ensure index.html is in public_html/ root

backend.setup:
1. Build: cd backend-robot && npm install && npm run build
2. Upload backend-robot/dist/ to backend/
3. Upload backend-robot/node_modules/ to backend/
4. Create .env.production in backend/ with DB credentials
5. Start: node dist/server.js
